property.name: sqlCheck.adap.sql
property.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROGRAM WHERE LABEL = 'ADAP-MER'

preConditions.onFailMessage: Database instance is not a ADAP database instance ! Do not include this changelog file in the master file

changeSet.author: benoit.lavenier@e-is.pro

and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM taxon_name where name = 'Gadidae' and TAXONOMIC_LEVEL_FK=26

changeSet.sql: update TAXON_NAME set TAXONOMIC_LEVEL_FK=17 where name='Gadidae' and TAXONOMIC_LEVEL_FK=26; commit;

and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM taxon_name where label = 'SCE'

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR reference_taxon_seq

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR TAXON_NAME_SEQ

column.name: REFERENCE_TAXON_FK
column.valueComputed: (select max(id) from reference_taxon WHERE UPDATE_DATE > date_sub(current_timestamp, INTERVAL 2 SECOND))

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR reference_taxon_seq

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR TAXON_NAME_SEQ

column.name: PARENT_TAXON_NAME_FK
column.valueComputed: (select id from taxon_name WHERE comments='Pectinidae' AND IS_REFERENT = true AND TAXONOMIC_LEVEL_FK=17)

column.name: REFERENCE_TAXON_FK
column.valueComputed: (select max(id) from reference_taxon WHERE UPDATE_DATE > date_sub(current_timestamp, INTERVAL 2 SECOND))

column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR reference_taxon_seq

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR TAXON_NAME_SEQ

column.name: PARENT_TAXON_NAME_FK
column.valueComputed: (select id from taxon_name WHERE comments='Pecten' AND IS_REFERENT = true AND TAXONOMIC_LEVEL_FK=26)

column.name: REFERENCE_TAXON_FK
column.valueComputed: (select max(id) from reference_taxon WHERE UPDATE_DATE > date_sub(current_timestamp, INTERVAL 2 SECOND))

column.name: ID
column.valueComputed: NEXT VALUE FOR TAXON_GROUP_HISTORICAL_REC_SEQ

column.name: TAXON_GROUP_FK
column.valueComputed: (SELECT ID FROM TAXON_GROUP WHERE TAXON_GROUP_TYPE_FK=2 AND LABEL='SCE')

column.name: REFERENCE_TAXON_FK
column.valueComputed: (SELECT REFERENCE_TAXON_FK FROM TAXON_NAME WHERE LABEL='SCE' AND IS_REFERENT = true)
